title: Reposition image and microphone buttons to left of chat input with aligned heights

requirements.text: Move the image upload button and microphone button to the left side of the text input field in the MessageInput component

quotes: can you move the image button and the microphone button to the left of the chat input in the chatroom page

acceptanceCriteria: Image button appears on the far left
Microphone button appears between image button and text input
Text input field appears on the right side of both buttons

requirements.text: Ensure the text input field, image button, and microphone button all have matching heights and are perfectly aligned vertically in the MessageInput component

quotes: make sure the the text input has the same height as the buttons and all are perfectly aligned

acceptanceCriteria: All three elements (image button, microphone button, text input) have identical heights
Elements are perfectly aligned vertically with no misalignment
Layout maintains consistent spacing between elements

constraints: Preserve existing voice recording functionality that hides text input and buttons
Maintain all existing button functionalities (image upload, voice recording)
Keep the text input's character limit and auto-detection features intact
nonGoals: Changing the styling or colors of the buttons
Altering the media preview or URL detection logic
